blogPost.excerpt: Fancy Font is amazing tool which allows you to give a Fancy Look to your Smart Phone and app also facilitated you to create cool nickname for game too.
blogPost.body: Fancy Font is amazing tool which allows you to give a Fancy Look to your Smart Phone and app also facilitated you to create cool nickname for game too.
blogPost.title: Fancy Fonts, Text and Nickname - Give fancy look to your phone & create unique game nickname
blogPost.author: Tejas Bhatt

localize.description: Fancy Font是一款非常神奇的工具，它可以让你给你的智能手机起一个花哨的名字，同时也方便你给游戏起一个很酷的昵称。
localize.tagline: 给你的手机起个花哨的名字，创造独特的游戏昵称。

localize.description: Fancy Font是一款非常神奇的工具，它可以讓你給你的智能手機起一個花哨的名字，同時也方便你給遊戲起一個很酷的暱稱。
localize.tagline: 給你的手機起個花哨的名字，創造獨特的遊戲暱稱。

previous.excerpt: Vmaker is an all-in-one video messaging tool encompassing a screen/webcam recorder, a player, and an in-built video editor. 📹 Vmaker provides the best-in-class Video Management System that gives a seamless experience with asset management. 📂
previous.title: Vmaker for Chrome - Asynchronous video messaging made easy

localize.description: Vmaker是一款集屏幕/网络摄像头录像机、播放器和内置视频编辑器于一体的视频信息传递工具。📹 Vmaker提供了一流的视频管理系统，为资产管理提供了无缝体验。📂
localize.tagline: 异步视频信息传递变得简单

localize.description: Vmaker是一款集屏幕/網絡攝像頭錄像機、播放器和內置視頻編輯器於一體的視頻信息傳遞工具。📹 Vmaker提供了一流的視頻管理系統，爲資產管理提供了無縫體驗。📂
localize.tagline: 異步視頻信息傳遞變得簡單

next.excerpt: A daily battle plan that helps you define the right things that set yourself up for success. Schedules out every second of every day, gets your head right, gets you goal-oriented, and target-focused everyday. Web-app version of 10X Planner by Grant Cardone.
next.title: 10X Planner - A daily planner for entrepreneurs that want 10X their life

localize.description: 每天的作战计划，帮助你确定正确的事情，为自己的成功做准备。排列出每一天的每一秒钟，让你的头脑正确，让你每天目标明确，目标集中。格兰特-卡东的《10X计划书》的网络应用版。
localize.tagline: 创业者想要10倍人生的每日计划书

localize.description: 每天的作戰計劃，幫助你確定正確的事情，爲自己的成功做準備。排列出每一天的每一秒鐘，讓你的頭腦正確，讓你每天目標明確，目標集中。格蘭特-卡東的《10X計劃書》的網絡應用版。
localize.tagline: 創業者想要10倍人生的每日計劃書
